net.tinyos.sim.script.reflect
Class Random

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.tinyos.sim.script.reflect.SimReflect
        |
        +--net.tinyos.sim.script.reflect.Random
public class Random
extends net.tinyos.sim.script.reflect.SimReflect

The Random class is used as a hook to get random numbers from the single random number generator instance within the simulator. This should be used instead of java.util.Random or the python builtin interface to allow a single seed value to be passed to Tython and therefore enable repeatable simulations.
